casebody.data:
BLUE v. HERKIMER NAT. BANK. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 6, 1930. No. 155. *666Charles E. Snyder and Snyder, Cristman & Snyder, all of Herkimer, N. Y., for appellant. Cornelius J. Danaher, of Meriden, Conn., and Willis, Doolittle & Guile, of Utiea, N. Y. (Woodward W. Guile, of Utiea, N. Y., of counsel), for respondent.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

.Affirmed on opinion below.
